description:
Beaux has done a lot of work for other sites, but I hope he will be new to you, or at least you are fan of his. I liked his big beefy thickness, though I wish I could have convinced him to grow his pubes out.
His video is hot, and as he promised he shot a pretty hefty load that nearly took out his eye. Ok, so I keep replaying the moment when he cums and "jerks" a little as he realize the load is about to splatter. Almost an "America's Funniest Porn Moment", but he kept it together despite the narrow miss.
title: Beaux - Solo
